ai-anya-e1214n3:2_0: deceitfulness in the art of generation,
ai-anya-e1214n3:3_0: (As) you who have eaten food, drink, clothes and vehicles,
ai-anya-e1214n3:5_0: How many kinds of encircling walls
ai-anya-e1214n3:6_0: Vidhura, having fallen away from the deliverance,
ai-anya-e1214n3:7_0: for that is their (performed) powder, and so on infested (the Buddha).
